about_the_game:
Inspired by the racing games found in real arcades in the 90s like SEGA Rally Championship and SEGA Rally 2, DDI RALLY CHAMPIONSHIP aims to recreate a game that you can pick up and play without feeling like it's a job. No career modes or complicated mechanics, just choose a course, choose a car and drive.

Fully Compatible With The STEAM DECK

Current Features:

  • Full Controller Support
  • Force feedback Wheel Support
  • Controller Rumble
  • Controller Remapper
  • 5 Selectable Vehicles
  • 5 Selectable Courses
  • Playground Island
  • Dynamic Time of Day
  • Dynamic Weather
  • Championship Mode
  • Time Trial Mode
  • Practice Mode
  • CRT Screen Effect
  • Championship Mode Leaderboards
  • Time Trial Mode Leaderboards

Upcoming Planned Features:

  • Fastest Lap Leaderboards
  • Replays
  • Ghost Vehicles
  • Attract Mode
  • Mirrored Courses
  • Reversed Courses
  • Mirrored & Reversed Courses
  • Another 11 Unlockable Vehicles/Variations


DDI Rally Championship is an electrifying arcade video game that puts you behind the wheel of powerful rally cars, ready to conquer the most challenging off-road tracks across the globe. Strap in and get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed racing, as you navigate through dynamic terrains, including rugged mountains, dense forests, and treacherous deserts.

Whether you're a seasoned rally racer or a rookie looking for excitement, DDI Rally Championship guarantees heart-pounding arcade racing action, stunning visuals, and an authentic rally racing atmosphere that will keep you coming back for more. It's time to rev your engines, conquer the world's most demanding tracks, and claim your place in rally racing history!

name: DDI Rally Championship

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Quad Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060

short_description: Strap in and get ready to experience the thrill of high-speed racing, as you navigate through dynamic terrains, including rugged mountains, dense forests, and treacherous deserts.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
